hero.excerpt: Democratizing founder knowledge through AI-driven content generation.
hero.subtitle: An automated system that curates, structures, and generates comprehensive guides on idea discovery, validation, and execution for modern builders.

author.name: Apex Neural Team
author.bio: Building the next generation of AI-native development tools.

overview.text: DBaaS E-Books is a knowledge distribution engine designed to bridge the gap between complex technical concepts and actionable business execution. Powered by the Tale-weaver core, it dynamically generates structured educational content—from EPUBs to PDFs—teaching founders how to discover ideas, validate markets, and execute builds. It transforms raw knowledge into distinct, consumable learning paths.

architecture.description: The system utilizes a modular backend service (`Tale-weaver`) to orchestrate content generation. It decouples the writing tone, genre structure, and output formatting (EPUB/PDF) from the core content logic. This allows for dynamic re-packaging of knowledge into various formats suitable for e-readers or print.

components.name: Content Engine
components.desc: Core logic handling genre selection, tone adjustment, and chapter outlining.

components.name: Format Service
components.desc: Python-based renderer (`ebooklib`, `reportlab`) converting text to professional layouts.

components.name: Metadata Layer
components.desc: Injects author bios, synopses, and semantic tagging for specialized outputs.

components.name: AI Orchestrator
components.desc: Drives the narrative flow ensuring consistency across multi-chapter volumes.

codeSnippet.code:
async def create_epub(book_data: BookData) -> bytes: """Generate an EPUB file from book data.""" book = epub.EpubBook() # Dynamic Metadata Injection book.set_identifier(book_data.id) book.set_title(book_data.title) book.add_author(book_data.author) # Modular Chapter Assembly for chapter in book_data.chapters: epub_chapter = epub.EpubHtml( title=chapter.title, file_name=f"chapter_{chapter.chapter_number}.xhtml" ) # Content injection with semantic styling epub_chapter.content = f"

{chapter.title}

{chapter.content}" book.add_item(epub_chapter) return output.read()

proTip.title: Semantic Structuring
proTip.text: By treating book content as structured data (`BookData` schema), the system can instantly repurpose the same core knowledge into different outputs—generating a technical manual, a narrative guide, or a checklist summary without rewriting the source material.

workflow.description: The learning journey for the end-user mirrors the creation process. Founders start by consuming content on Idea Discovery, move to Market Validation methodologies, Apply these frameworks to their projects, and finally Execute using the strategies outlined in the generated guides.
workflow.caption: From Knowledge Acquisition to Practical Execution
